text: Finding words after keyword in python
Hi i am very new to python and very new to regex, so i would appreciate your patience and understanding.
I want to find words that appear after a keyword(specified and searched by me) and print out the result.
I know that i am suppose to use regex to do it, and i tried it out too, like this:

code:
import re
s = "hi my name is ryan, and i am new to python and would like to learn more"
m = re.search("^name: (\w+)", s)
print m.groups()

text: But i want to get all the words and punctuations that comes after the word "name".
could someone help me out with this?
Any help would be largely appreciated.
